## Public Member Functions

### startBackendTimer() {#ae58c222745a6c74a640bdc315cd667c0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void TGTimer::startBackendTimer (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name)</>}>
Start timing the overall backend.

If the backend itself starts a timer, then this timer is cleared.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/tablegen/tgtimer-h/#l00048">48</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/tablegen/tgtimer-h">TGTimer.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tgtimer-cpp/#l00041">41</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tgtimer-cpp">TGTimer.cpp</a>.
